0.1.0.description:
## Setup Guide:

Download the following:

- lrff13.apworld
- LRRandomizer#.#.#.#.7z
- [Nova Chrysalia mod manager v2.0.3](https://mega.nz/file/24gyiB7b#nTIlktJb8ZCo8dXZDxCgwsdHAUDPURQhixSfucypIVg)

### AP World and Seed Setup
1. Double click the lrff13.apworld to install the custom world
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `Generate Template Options` to open the folder with the template yaml files
4. Copy the `Lightning Returns Final Fantasy XIII.yaml` template to the `Players` folder
5. Open your YAML file and edit the `name: Player{number}` to set your name.
`{number}` is needed if there will others in the seed with a similar name, you can remove it otherwise.
Modify any other options you want below.
6. If hosting: Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
7. Click `Generate`
8. Go the `output` folder, and you will find your created `AP_#####.zip` file.
9. To host the game, upload `AP_#####.zip` to: https://archipelago.gg/uploads

### Randomizer Seed Setup

1. Extract the Nova Chrysalia.7z to a folder of your choosing (using Windows, 7zip, etc).
2. Run Nova Chrysalia for the first time and select under Global Installation: "Unpack Game Data (EN Audio)" or "Unpack Game Data (JP Audio)" for the language audio you prefer
    - Note: You may need to launch LR normally from Steam first
4. Once the AP room is created, click the "Download Patch File" link to download a .aplrff13 mod file.
5. Extract `LRRandomizer#.#.#.#.7z` to a folder of your choosing.
6. Open the extracted folder and run LRRando.exe
7. On the `1. Setup` page and at the top, setup the paths to your Steam LR FFXIII folder and Nova.
8. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from ZIP/APLRFF13` and select your .aplrff13 file
9. After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
10. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
11. On the `3. Finish` page, click `Generate Modpack`
12. Open Nova Chrysalia and install the generated .ncmp modpack. It will appear in the `packs` folder of LRRandomizer
13. Launch the game from Nova Chrysalia in "Unpacked" mode with the "Voice Over Settings" matching the language you unpacked game data for.

### AP LR FF13 Client

1. Launch the game
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `Lightning Returns Final Fantasy XIII Client`
4. Connect to your room with the correct port and player name

**WARNING:** Loading any other saves while connected to the client may send some unexpected checks to the server. Be careful not load any other saves.
0.1.0.title: LR FFXIII AP Rando 0.1.0

0.1.1.description:
# Changelog
- Fix client and game desyncing item retrieval after loading a save
- Fix gil always being added as 1 gil in game

Requires both an .apworld client update to 0.1.1 and regenerating the modpack with LRRando 0.8.2.2. The AP seed does not need to be regenerated if coming from 0.1.0.

# PSA
If you are upgrading Nova Chrysalia mod manager from 1.X to 2.X, extract the contents of the Nova 7z into your existing 1.X install. This will ensure files are properly tracked by 2.X. There is some risk if done incorrectly, so you may consider backing up your 1.X install first.

# Known Issues/Limits
- Nova Chrysalia mod manager must be closed for the LRRando program to generate a seed modpack
- No option to disable DLC items in the pool yet (you must turn on DLC in the in-game settings)
- Items sent to you are retrieved by holding the sprint button on the field (L2/R2 or LT/RT). This is a workaround to avoid crashes when trying to add automatically with no input.
- Game overs are removed so you can technically get to the final day without completing the 5 main quests. This is safer for AP, but obviously that would be out of logic by skipping everything.
- Chests that cost 6 EP are not currently in logic and are considered excluded/missable
- Recovery items received from AP while your recovery item bag is full will be lost

# Troubleshooting
- Do NOT use the File > Reboot option in game, always close the game and relaunch through Nova
- In Nova, always launch the game in Unpacked mode with "Voice Over Setting" set to the language you unpacked data for. 

If you still have issues without not seeing modded content:
1. Delete unpacked game data in Nova
2. Unpack game data again in Nova
3. Regenerate the rando modpack
4. Uninstall and remove the old modpack in Nova, and re-install the modpack
5. Be sure to launch the game in Unpacked and in the same voice language as unpacked data (EN/JP)!

0.1.1.title: LR FFXIII AP Rando 0.1.1

0.2.0.description:
# Changelog
- Fixed exclusion settings not working
- Moved excluded/missable locations out of AP pool to local only filler items
- Added setting to Include DLC Items (off by default)
- LR Rando program now displays warning if Nova is opened and needs to be closed (workaround for the Nova bug causing this)
- Logic updates to push ultimate lair and Aeronite into later spheres
- Fix non-AP seed generation taking hundreds of attempts and not handling adornment progression for Adorning quests correctly

Not compatible with 0.1.X seeds! Advised to use on newly generated seeds only.

# PSA
If you are upgrading Nova Chrysalia mod manager from 1.X to 2.X, extract the contents of the Nova 7z into your existing 1.X install. This will ensure files are properly tracked by 2.X. There is some risk if done incorrectly, so you may consider backing up your 1.X install first.

# Known Issues/Limits
- Items sent to you are retrieved by holding the sprint button on the field (L2/R2 or LT/RT). This is a workaround to avoid crashes when trying to add automatically with no input.
- Game overs are removed so you can technically get to the final day without completing the 5 main quests. This is safer for AP, but obviously that would be out of logic by skipping everything.
- Chests that cost 6 EP are not currently in logic and are considered excluded/missable
- Recovery items received from AP while your recovery item bag is full will be lost

# Troubleshooting
- Do NOT use the File > Reboot option in game, always close the game and relaunch through Nova
- In Nova, always launch the game in Unpacked mode with "Voice Over Setting" set to the language you unpacked data for. 

If you still have issues without not seeing modded content:
1. Delete unpacked game data in Nova
2. Unpack game data again in Nova
3. Regenerate the rando modpack
4. Uninstall and remove the old modpack in Nova, and re-install the modpack
5. Be sure to launch the game in Unpacked and in the same voice language as unpacked data (EN/JP)!

0.2.0.title: LR FFXIII AP Rando 0.2.0

0.2.1r2.description:
# Changelog
- Fix loading saves again
- Fix Fuzzy Search and Round em up requirements
- Fix initial items being the same for all LR players
- Fix + equipment of first 2 equipment sets being allowed to show up on initial equipment, allowing softlocks
- Fix recovery items showing up in quests which cause infinite loads if bag is full
- Fix loading an AP save and then starting a new game without closing LR resulting in no items received

Requires both an .apworld client update to 0.2.1 and regenerating the modpack with LRRando 0.8.2.4. AP seeds generated on 0.2.0 can still be played.

# Notes
- If you are upgrading Nova Chrysalia mod manager from 1.X to 2.X, uninstall all mods from Nova 1.X first, extract Nova 2.X to a new location, and install all your previous mods in Nova 2.X.
- EN Text is required. Text for other languages is not supported due to maintainability concerns with the duplicated data.

# Known Issues/Limits
- Items sent to you are retrieved by holding the sprint button on the field (L2/R2 or LT/RT). This is a workaround to avoid crashes when trying to add automatically with no input.
- Game overs are removed so you can technically get to the final day without completing the 5 main quests. This is safer for AP, but obviously that would be out of logic by skipping everything.
- Chests that cost 6 EP are not currently in logic and are considered excluded/missable
- Recovery items received from AP while your recovery item bag is full will be lost

# Troubleshooting
- Do NOT use the File > Reboot option in game, always close the game and relaunch through Nova
- In Nova, always launch the game in Unpacked mode with "Voice Over Setting" set to the language you unpacked data for. 

If you still have issues without not seeing modded content:
1. Delete unpacked game data in Nova
2. Unpack game data again in Nova
3. Regenerate the rando modpack
4. Uninstall and remove the old modpack in Nova, and re-install the modpack
5. Be sure to launch the game in Unpacked and in the same voice language as unpacked data (EN/JP)!

0.2.1r2.title: LR FFXIII AP Rando 0.2.1

0.3.0.description:
# Changelog
## 0.8.2.13 LRRandomizer Hotfix
- Fix performance issues on the field when looping through 9999 AP items to see if they were picked up
## 0.3.0
- Fix ID 0 unknown location
- Change yaml defaults for CoP and ultimate lair to false
- Change EP cost randomization to slightly favor values closer to the original cost
- Reduce bosses' HP placed in superboss locations by about 25%
- Fix logic issues on Soul Seed quest and Seeing The Dawn

Client and generator do not work with seeds already started on older versions.

# Notes
- If you are upgrading Nova Chrysalia mod manager from 1.X to 2.X, uninstall all mods from Nova 1.X first, extract Nova 2.X to a new location, and install all your previous mods in Nova 2.X.
- EN Text is required. Text for other languages is not supported due to maintainability concerns with the duplicated data.

# Known Issues/Limits
- Items sent to you are retrieved by holding the sprint button on the field (L2/R2 or LT/RT). This is a workaround to avoid crashes when trying to add automatically with no input.
- Game overs are removed so you can technically get to the final day without completing the 5 main quests. This is safer for AP, but obviously that would be out of logic by skipping everything.
- Chests that cost 6 EP are not currently in logic and are considered excluded/missable
- Recovery items received from AP while your recovery item bag is full will be lost

# Troubleshooting
- Do NOT use the File > Reboot option in game, always close the game and relaunch through Nova
- In Nova, always launch the game in Unpacked mode with "Voice Over Setting" set to the language you unpacked data for. 

If you still have issues without not seeing modded content:
1. Delete unpacked game data in Nova
2. Unpack game data again in Nova
3. Regenerate the rando modpack
4. Uninstall and remove the old modpack in Nova, and re-install the modpack
5. Be sure to launch the game in Unpacked and in the same voice language as unpacked data (EN/JP)!

Modify any other options you want below.

12. Go the `output` folder, and you will find your created `AP_#####.zip` file.

2. Run Nova Chrysalia for the first time and select under Global Installation: "Unpack Game Data (EN Audio)" or "Unpack Game Data (JP Audio)" for the language audio you prefer
    - Note: You may need to launch LR normally from Steam first
4. Once the AP room is created, click the "Download Patch File" link to download a .aplrff13 mod file.
5. Extract `LRRandomizer#.#.#.#.7z` to a folder of your choosing.
6. Open the extracted folder and run LRRando.exe
7. On the `1. Setup` page and at the top, setup the paths to your Steam LR FFXIII folder and Nova.
8. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from ZIP/APLRFF13` and select your .aplrff13 file
9. After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
14. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
15. On the `3. Finish` page, click `Generate Modpack`
16. Open Nova Chrysalia and install the generated .ncmp modpack. It will appear in the `packs` folder of LRRandomizer
17. Launch the game from Nova Chrysalia in "Unpacked" mode with the "Voice Over Settings" matching the language you unpacked game data for.

0.3.0.title: LR FFXIII AP Rando 0.3.0

0.3.1.description:
# Changelog
## 0.3.1
- Fix client updating inventory when your menu is open
- Client now disconnects when the game is closed as automatically reconnecting was a bit buggy

## 0.3.0
- Fix performance issues on the field when looping through 9999 AP items to see if they were picked up
- Fix ID 0 unknown location
- Change yaml defaults for CoP and ultimate lair to false
- Change EP cost randomization to slightly favor values closer to the original cost
- Reduce bosses' HP placed in superboss locations by about 25%
- Fix logic issues on Soul Seed quest and Seeing The Dawn

0.3.1 only has client updates. Reinstalling the .aplrff13 is not required.

# Notes
- If you are upgrading Nova Chrysalia mod manager from 1.X to 2.X, uninstall all mods from Nova 1.X first, extract Nova 2.X to a new location, and install all your previous mods in Nova 2.X.
- EN Text is required. Text for other languages is not supported due to maintainability concerns with the duplicated data.

# Known Issues/Limits
- Items sent to you are retrieved by holding the sprint button on the field (L2/R2 or LT/RT). This is a workaround to avoid crashes when trying to add automatically with no input.
- Game overs are removed so you can technically get to the final day without completing the 5 main quests. This is safer for AP, but obviously that would be out of logic by skipping everything.
- Chests that cost 6 EP are not currently in logic and are considered excluded/missable
- Recovery items received from AP while your recovery item bag is full will be lost

# Troubleshooting
- Do NOT use the File > Reboot option in game, always close the game and relaunch through Nova
- In Nova, always launch the game in Unpacked mode with "Voice Over Setting" set to the language you unpacked data for. 

If you still have issues without not seeing modded content:

3. Regenerate the rando modpack
4. Uninstall and remove the old modpack in Nova, and re-install the modpack
5. Be sure to launch the game in Unpacked and in the same voice language as unpacked data (EN/JP)!

0.3.1.title: LR FFXIII AP Rando 0.3.1
